title: Is He My Man of His Mom's Man
itunes:title: Is He My Man of His Mom's Man
description:
It’s beyond being a momma’s boy! He jokes about her thinking he is her man and I repeatedly tell him it’s not funny. I feel that she is jealous of the attention he gives me. Anything I say I want to do for him, she has to piggy back and try to do it too. If he tells me I look nice, she gives me a sad look and he has to compliment her more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
